testimonial_request_message:
When someone takes the time to recount a positive experience, it speaks volumes. And so I would like to request a small favour â€“ a testimonial that will give others a sense of the experience and service I offer.

This testimonial can be as short or as long as you like. It is valuable to my future business and, just as importantly, allows me to continuously improve upon the level of service I provide. Feel free to either e-mail me or use the link below to share your thoughts on your experience with my company.

I sincerely appreciate your help and look forward to servicing your needs for years to come.

Warmest Regards.
client_invitation_message: I have created an account for you on my website where you can view and save all listings. You can easily mark any property that you are interested in viewing. Edited
